Lead.title: Lead
Lead.description: Represents a lead captured through the lead capture overlay.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Lead entity.

rtoCode.description: RTO code associated with the audit for which the lead was captured.

timestamp.description: ISO Timestamp indicating when the lead was created.

definition.description: Stores lead information captured from the Lead Capture Overlay. Includes fields for name, email, phoneNumber, RTO code, and timestamps. Public create access enabled.

params.name: leadId
params.description: Unique identifier for the Lead document.

firestore.reasoning: Standardized schema to ensure consistency between lead capture forms and admin reporting tools.
